mapper.select: select u.user_id userId,u.username,u.user_rel_name userRelName,u.dept_id deptId,u.email,u.mobile, u.status,u.ssex,ur.role_id roleId from sys_manage_user u left join sys_manage_user_role ur on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) where u.user_id = #{userId}

select u.user_id userId,u.username,u.user_rel_name userRelName,u.dept_id deptId,u.email,u.mobile, u.status,u.ssex,um.menu_id menuId from sys_manage_user u left join sys_manage_user_menu um on (u.user_id = um.user_id) where u.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT U .USERNAME, U .USER_REL_NAME userRelName, U .USER_ID userId, D .DEPT_NAME deptName, U .mobile, U .email, U .avatar, U .description, U .ssex, U .dept_id deptId, group_concat(r.role_name) AS roleName FROM sys_manage_user U LEFT JOIN sys_manage_dept D ON U .DEPT_ID = D .DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN sys_manage_user_role ur ON U .user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_manage_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE U .USER_ID = #{userId} GROUP BY U .username, U .user_rel_name, D .dept_name, U .mobile, U .email, U .avatar, U .description, U .ssex, U .USER_ID, U .dept_id
